### Overview
Envoy is an L7 proxy and communication bus designed for large modern service oriented architectures. 

### About this Dashboard

This dashboard is based on standard `Envoy` Prometheus metrics ingested using Prometheus [remote write](https://newrelic.com/instant-observability/prometheus-remote-write/7dbd7355-c380-4211-bd32-fed9a65351af).  Most widgets utilize an `instance` facet to identify `Envoy` instances.

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT (average(envoy_server_live) * cardinality(envoy_server_live)) as '' WHERE ((service RLIKE '()') OR service IS NULL) WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%')

SELECT average(envoy_server_uptime)/60/60/24 as 'day' FROM Metric WHERE ((service RLIKE '()') OR service IS NULL) WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%')

SELECT (average(envoy_server_memory_allocated)/1024/1024 * cardinality(envoy_server_memory_allocated)) as 'MB' FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') AND instrumentation.name='remote-write'

SELECT (latest(envoy_cluster_membership_healthy) - latest(envoy_cluster_membership_total)) as '' FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') AND instrumentation.name='remote-write'

FROM (from(from Metric SELECT (latest(envoy_cluster_membership_healthy) - latest(envoy_cluster_membership_total)) as 'result' ) select latest(result) facet cases(WHERE result = 0 as 'Ok', WHERE result != 0 as 'Not well')) select latest(cases) as ''

SELECT (average(envoy_server_memory_heap_size)/1024/1024 * cardinality(envoy_server_memory_heap_size)) as 'MB' FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') AND instrumentation.name='remote-write'

SELECT (average(`__result_0`) * cardinality(`__result_0`)) FROM (SELECT irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_rx_bytes_total, 1 SECONDS) AS `__result_0` FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET dimensions() LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO) FACET tuple(envoy_cluster_name, instance) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(`__result_0`) * cardinality(`__result_0`)) FROM (SELECT irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_total, 1 SECONDS) AS `__result_0` FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET dimensions() LIMIT max TIMESERIES AUTO ) WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' FACET tuple(envoy_cluster_name, instance) LIMIT max TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(envoy_http_downstream_cx_active) * cardinality(envoy_http_downstream_cx_active)) FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') facet instance  LIMIT 100 TIMESERIES

SELECT (average(envoy_http_downstream_cx_active) * cardinality(envoy_http_downstream_cx_active)) FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET instance TIMESERIES

SELECT (average(`__result_0`) * cardinality(`__result_0`)) FROM (SELECT irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_rx_bytes_total, 1 SECONDS) AS `__result_0` FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET dimensions() LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES) FACET tuple(envoy_cluster_name, instance) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(`__result_0`) * cardinality(`__result_0`)) FROM (SELECT irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_tx_bytes_total, 1 SECONDS) AS `__result_0` FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET dimensions() LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO) FACET tuple(envoy_cluster_name, instance) LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(`__result_0`) * cardinality(`__result_0`)) FROM (SELECT irate(envoy_http_downstream_cx_rx_bytes_total, 1 SECONDS) AS `__result_0` FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET dimensions() LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES) FACET instance LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES

SELECT (average(`__result_0`) * cardinality(`__result_0`)) FROM (SELECT irate(envoy_http_downstream_cx_tx_bytes_total, 1 SECONDS) AS `__result_0` FROM Metric WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET dimensions() LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO) FACET instance LIMIT MAX TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT (average(envoy_cluster_membership_healthy) * cardinality(envoy_cluster_membership_healthy)) AS 'Healthy' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') TIMESERIES

SELECT (average(envoy_cluster_membership_total) * cardinality(envoy_cluster_membership_total)) as 'Total' FROM Metric WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT sum(envoy_dns_cares_resolve_total) WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET instance TIMESERIES

SELECT average(envoy_http_downstream_rq_xx) as '2XX' FROM Metric  WHERE envoy_response_code_class IN (2, '2') AND instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(envoy_http_downstream_rq_xx) as '3XX' FROM Metric  WHERE envoy_response_code_class IN (3, '3') AND  instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO

SELECT average(envoy_http_downstream_rq_xx) as '4XX' FROM Metric  WHERE envoy_response_code_class IN (4, '4') AND instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET instance TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(envoy_http_downstream_rq_xx) as '5XX' FROM Metric  WHERE envoy_response_code_class IN (5, '5') AND instrumentation.name='remote-write' TIMESERIES AUTO

FROM Metric SELECT sum(envoy_cluster_membership_total) AS 'Total' WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET tuple(instance,'Total') TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT sum(envoy_cluster_membership_healthy) AS 'Healthy' WHERE instrumentation.name='remote-write' AND (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') FACET tuple(instance,'Healthy') TIMESERIES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(instance) WHERE (app_kubernetes_io_name LIKE '%envoy%' or app_newrelic_com_name LIKE '%envoy%') AND instrumentation.name='remote-write' FACET metricName, prometheus_server, job
